content.question: How is Johnson’s perspective in this source similar to that of Paul Laurence Dunbar’s in “We Wear the Mask?”

choices.label: Both authors discuss the role of Christianity in shaping perceptions of African Americans by white society.
Both authors discuss how African American characters in literature are depicted as comedic.
Both authors discuss African Americans’ separation from full participation in American society.
Both authors discuss the continuity and change in the representation of African Americans in literature.

content.answer: Both authors discuss African Americans’ separation from full participation in American society.

topic.text: 3.7: The Color Line and Double Consciousness in American Society
